 
Given a large positive number of atmost 1000 digits. You have to find out whether that number is divisible by 17 or not.
Input
First line of input contains a number t, number of test cases. Then t lines follows each containing a number.
Output
For each test case output "YES" if number is divisible by 17 otherwise "NO".
Sample Input: 
2 1717171717171717171717171717171717171717 19
Sample Output: 
YES NO
